title: 5 Quick Steps to Make a Sawmill Crafting Station in Terraria

steps.title: Craft a workbench and place it down.
steps.content: Craft a workbench and place it down. You'll need 10 wood blocks to craft it. Use an axe on nearby trees to get wood blocks. You can also find work benches by looting Dungeons and Underground Cabins . Be sure to place down the crafting stations in a protected house to avoid enemies.

steps.title: Craft a furnace and place it down.
steps.content: Craft a furnace and place it down. You'll need 20 stone blocks, 4 wood blocks, and 3 torches to craft it. Stone blocks can be obtained by using the pickaxe on nearby stone. To craft a torch, you'll need 1 wood block and 1 gel. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Craft an anvil and place it down.
steps.content: Craft an anvil and place it down. You'll need 5 iron bars or 5 lead bars to craft it. You can also use an anvil to craft weapons needed to beat bosses and prepare for hardmode .

steps.title: Gather the sawmill materials.
steps.content: Gather the sawmill materials. You'll need a 1 chain, 10 wood blocks, and 2 iron bars to craft a sawmill. [2] X Research source To craft a chain at the anvil, you'll need 1 iron bar.

steps.title: Craft a sawmill.
steps.content: Craft a sawmill. Make sure all three crafting stations are placed down beside each other. Interact with the workbench to find the sawmill icon and craft it. You can now use the sawmill.
